      • develop

        public void develop(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                    java.awt.Dimension d,
                    boolean zeroMargin)
        Description copied from interface: Genome
        Attempt to mutate the genome represented by this Person.
        Parameters:
        g2 - the Graphics2D context upon which drawing is to take place
        d - the dimension of the box within which drawing is to take place
        zeroMargin - whether to zero the margins of the bounding box.

      • drawAnimal

        public void drawAnimal(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                       int x,
                       int y)
                throws ArthromorphGradientExceeds1000Exception
        An example of how to call Draw for an animal
        Parameters:
        g2 - a Graphics2D drawing context. May be null (for dry runs, calculating poles)
        x - the x coordinate where the animal is to be drawn.
        y - the y coordinate where the animal is to be drawn.
        Throws:
        ArthromorphGradientExceeds1000Exception - if the gradient exceeds 1000.
